body: These are the hotels, motels and shelters actively housing formerly homeless families as of July 31, 1983, under the city welfare program (the number fluctuates from month to month, but averages about 50): HOTELS AND MOTELS Alps, 44 Boston Road, Bronx. title: List of Hotels, Motels And

body: The New York City Department of Health cited 30 food establishments last week for violations of the health code. In addition, the department named nine places that were allowed to reopen after correcting earlier violations and four that were closed for having failed to do so. The establishments are these: VIOLATIONS 28 Broadway, 28 Broadway.
title: VIOLATIONS AT FOOD SPOTS CITED

body: For writers, Brooklyn has never been primarily the borough of the Bridge. Borough of churches, borough of nostalgia, borough of hope (for Dodgers fans), it is above all a piece of geography or, if you prefer, a considerable piece of real estate. Literary visitors have found it an urban alternative to Manhattan's desperate pursuit of the present.
title: BROOKLYN, BOROUGH OF WRITERS
